what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBrodmann
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBrodmann
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBrodmann
text: data/*.rda – Unified ggseg_atlas objects (2D + 3D one object) R/data.R – Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegBrodmann-package.R – Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats R/sysdata.rda – Internal palette data (brain_pals) data-raw/ – Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBrodmann
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg::geom_brain() (2D) ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBrodmann
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBrodmann
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: Brodmann Areas Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: Brodmann Areas Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: package contains dataset plotting brodmann atlas ggseg ggseg3d, based supplementary materials Pijnenburg et al., NeuroImage, 239, 2021 DOI; Version 1; 15-01-2021. learn use atlases, please look documentation ggseg ggseg3d

title: Brodmann Areas Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: recommend installing ggseg-atlases ggseg r-universe: can install released version ggsegBrodmann GitHub :
code: # Enable this universe options(repos = c(     ggsegverse = 'https://ggsegverse.r-universe.dev',     CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Install some packages install.packages('ggsegBrodmann') # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("ggsegverse/ggsegBrodmann") library(ggseg) #> Warning: package 'ggseg' was built under R version 4.1.1 #> Loading required package: ggplot2 library(ggseg3d) library(ggsegBrodmann)  plot(brodmann) +   theme(legend.position = "bottom",          legend.text = element_text(size = 9)) +   guides(fill = guide_legend(ncol = 6)) library(dplyr) ggseg3d(atlas = brodmann_3d) %>%    add_glassbrain() %>%    pan_camera("right lateral")

title: Brodmann Areas Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: FreeSurfer annotation files (lh.fsaverage_Brodmann.annot, rh.fsaverage_Brodmann.annot) data-raw/ supplementary materials Pijnenburg et al. (2021), extracted Brodmann.zip. fsaverage space (163k vertices) require resampling fsaverage5 via mri_surf2surf use ggsegExtra pipeline. FreeSurfer also ships lh.PALS_B12_Brodmann.annot rh.PALS_B12_Brodmann.annot $FREESURFER_HOME/subjects/fsaverage/label/ alternative Brodmann parcellation. Source: http://www.dutchconnectomelab.nl/ Reference: Pijnenburg R, Scholtens LH, Ardesch DJ, de Lange SC, Wei Y, van den Heuvel MP (2021). Myelo- cytoarchitectonic microstructural functional human cortical atlases reconstructed common MRI space. NeuroImage, 239, 118274. doi:[10.1016/j.neuroimage.2021.118274](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2021.118274) Please note ‘ggsegBrodmann’ project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

title: Brodmann Areas Atlas — brodmann
text: Brain atlas Brodmann areas cortical parcellation 39 regions per hemisphere. Contains 2D polygon geometry ggseg::geom_brain() 3D vertex indices ggseg3d::ggseg3d().

title: Brodmann Areas Atlas — brodmann
text: Brodmann K (1909). Vergleichende Lokalisationslehre der Grosshirnrinde. Leipzig: Johann Ambrosius Barth. Pijnenburg R, et al. (2021). NeuroImage, 239, 118274. doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2021.118274

title: Brodmann Areas Atlas — brodmann

what: ggsegBrodmann: Brodmann Areas Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegBrodmann-package
title: ggsegBrodmann: Brodmann Areas Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegBrodmann-package
text: Brodmann areas atlas 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 2D polygon geometry 3D vertex indices, use 'ggseg' 'ggseg3d'.

title: ggsegBrodmann: Brodmann Areas Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegBrodmann-package
ggsegBrodmann 2.0.0
text: brodmann now ggseg_atlas object (ggseg.formats) containing 2D 3D data. separate brodmann_3d object removed. Use ggplot() + ggseg::geom_brain(atlas = brodmann) 2D plots ggseg3d::ggseg3d(atlas = brodmann) 3D plots – object. ggseg.formats now hard dependency (Depends). Package URLs updated LCBC-UiO ggseg GitHub organisation.
